hero.title: Build Your Knowledge Together
hero.subtitle: A collaborative learning platform where students and teachers connect to share knowledge, ask questions, and grow together.
hero.qaDescription: Ask questions and help others learn

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Discover the tools that make JAMC Q&A the ultimate learning platform

askAnswer.title: Ask & Answer
askAnswer.description: Post questions, provide answers, and engage in meaningful academic discussions.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.description: Receive intelligent recommendations and related content suggestions.

collaborativeLearning.title: Collaborative Learning
collaborativeLearning.description: Foster a supportive community where knowledge is shared freely.

knowledgeBase.title: Rich Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Access a growing library of questions, answers, and academic resources.

reputationSystem.title: Reputation System
reputationSystem.description: Earn recognition for your contributions and build your academic profile.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Educators verify and rate answers to ensure accuracy and reliability.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to enhance your learning experience

askQuestion.title: Ask a Question
askQuestion.description: Post your academic queries and get help from the community.

receiveAnswers.title: Receive Answers
receiveAnswers.description: Get responses from peers and educators, often within minutes.

learnGrow.title: Learn & Grow
learnGrow.description: Expand your knowledge and improve your academic performance.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Learning Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students and educators who are already benefiting from our platform. Start asking questions, sharing knowledge, and growing academically today.
cta.thankYou: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
cta.privacyNotice: By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy Policy and consent to receive updates from our company.

footer.description: Connecting students and educators in a collaborative learning environment.

QuestionsPage.title: Questions
QuestionsPage.noQuestionsFound: No questions found matching your filters.
QuestionsPage.noQuestionsYet: No questions yet. Be the first to ask!

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 10 characters
validation.titleMax: Title must be less than 150 characters
validation.contentMin: Description must be at least 20 characters
validation.tagsRequired: Please select at least one tag

QuestionForm.tagsHint: Select at least one tag to categorize your question

questionType.label: Question Type
questionType.objectiveDescription: Fact-based questions with specific, correct answers
questionType.structuredDescription: Explanations and analysis requiring detailed responses

form.title: Question Title
form.titlePlaceholder: e.g., How do I solve quadratic equations?
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide more details about your question...

similarQuestions.title: Similar Questions
similarQuestions.description: These questions might be related to yours. Check them out before posting!

guidelines.title: Posting Guidelines
guidelines.beSpecific: Be specific and clear about your question
guidelines.includeDetails: Include all relevant details and context
guidelines.useFormatting: Use proper formatting for code or equations
guidelines.checkSimilar: Check for similar questions before posting

ProfileEditPage.description: Update your profile information and avatar

roleSelection.description: How would you like to use JAMC? You can always change this later.
